content.raw:
Sorry to resurrect this 2-year-old ticket, but I'm struggling with understanding what frame fdir1 is specified in. With no way to visualize the friction ([GA](http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/9030/visualizing-friction/)), I'm left basically referencing ODE documentation ([cf](http://www.ode.org/ode-latest-userguide.html#sec_7_3_7)).

Is there a Gazebo doc I'm not seeing which describes what the deal is with friction?
